Slothkrew

Welcome to the Slothkrew website. We're a group of technology and security enthusiasts from around the world who enjoy talking about infosec, tech, and code.

We can usually be found loitering in #slothkrew on freenode.

We sometimes take part in capture the flag competitions.

Feel free to drop by!
